short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, organise and cite web content with ease

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of losing track of important web content during your research? Web Research Clipper is the ultimate tool for saving and organising web content seamlessly. With the quick-save context menu and a side panel for enhanced visibility, you can capture, organise and cite critical information effortlessly. Whether you're studying, researching or working on professional projects, Web Research Clipper transforms how you manage online insights, saving you time and streamlining your workflow.

Features:

Intuitive Saving Options
- Save Selection from Context Menu: Right-click to save content directly from any pageâ€”even those restricting popups.
- Smart Button Group: On selecting text, choose to save or ignore with a simple click.

Enhanced Side Panel Experience
- Optimised for visibility and accessibility, the side panel makes reviewing, editing, and managing clips a breeze.
- Easily navigate saved clips, search by keyword, or manage storage space with visual indicators.

Adaptability to All Websites
- Works seamlessly across web platforms, overcoming popup restrictions with versatile saving options.

Time-Saving Efficiency
- Stay focused with an efficient workflow: Save, sync, cite, or share content without breaking stride.
- Context-aware design ensures the extension adapts to your research habits.

Perfect for Researchers and Professionals
- Provides a consistent and organised way to manage citations and notes across devices, tailored to the demands of academia and industry.
